string-array.name: faq_questions_list
string-array.item: Who can post jobs on Nibay?
What types of jobs are available on Nibay?
Do I need an account to apply for a job?
Why do I need to select my role during registration?
What documents do I need to upload?
Can I apply for a job without all required documents?
How do I know if I already applied for a job?
Does applying guarantee I’ll get the job?
How will I know if my application is accepted or rejected?
Can I apply to jobs outside my selected role?
Can I edit my profile later?
Can I follow a specific employer?
Is my personal data safe with Nibay?
Can I filter jobs based on role?
Can I view jobs only from followed employers?

string-array.name: faq_answers_list
string-array.item: Nibay is a job platform that connects transport jobseekers with employers, including companies and individuals.
Both companies/organizations and individual employers can post job ads on Nibay.
Nibay lists jobs for Checker, Driver, Mechanic, Supervisor, GM, and other transport roles.
Yes, you need to create a profile and complete onboarding to apply for any job.
It helps us request the right documents and information specific to your job type.
Required documents depend on your role. The app will guide you during registration.
No. If required documents are missing, the app will ask you to upload them before proceeding.
Applied jobs are marked in the list, and all your applications appear in the "Already Applied Jobs" section.
No. Getting a job depends entirely on the employer’s decision.
You’ll receive a push notification when the status changes. You can also check it manually in the app.
No. You can only apply to jobs that match the role you selected and are qualified for.
Yes. You can update your profile and uploaded documents anytime from the Profile section.
Yes. Following an employer makes it easier to find jobs they post.
Yes. We store and use your data responsibly. Check the Privacy Policy section for more details.
Yes. Use the filter to view jobs specific to your selected role.
Yes. There’s a section that shows jobs only from employers you follow.

resources.string:
Welcome to Nibay

By using this app ("App"), you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. Please read carefully:

1. Eligibility
You must be 18+ years old and legally allowed to work in your region.

2. Account Information
- Provide accurate registration details.
- Do not share your credentials; you are responsible for all activity under your account.

3. Role & Document Verification
- Choose your role (Driver, Mechanic, etc.) during registration.
- Upload required documents like NID or license. Incomplete profiles may not qualify for jobs.

4. Job Application & Process
- Apply only to relevant job roles.
- Submitting an application does not guarantee a job.
- Hiring decisions rest entirely with employers.

5. Employer Responsibilities
- Employers must provide truthful job details and cannot charge applicants.
- Nibay does not verify job authenticity.

6. Content & Conduct
- No misleading, illegal, or abusive content.
- Harassment, spam, or fraud may lead to termination.

7. App Use & Notifications
- You may follow employers and receive updates.
- Notifications include job status, app changes, and account alerts.

8. Limitation of Liability
Nibay is not liable for loss due to employer actions, technical failures, or external factors.

9. Data Security
We use encryption and access controls but cannot guarantee absolute data security.

10. Intellectual Property
All app content and branding belong to Nibay or its licensors. Unauthorized reuse is prohibited.

11. Amendments
We may update these terms. Continued use implies acceptance.

12. Termination
Accounts may be suspended or removed for policy violations.

13. Governing Law
These Terms are governed by the laws of Bangladesh.

14. Contact
For any questions, visit the Help & Support section in the app.

Privacy Policy for Nibay

At Nibay, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

1. Information We Collect
- Personal Data: Name, contact details, date of birth, driving license, national ID, profile photo, and other details you provide.
- Usage Data: App usage, searches, job applications, and preferences.
- Device Data: IP address, device type, OS version, and analytics.

2. How We Use Your Information
- To provide and maintain the app services.
- To verify your identity and documents.
- To communicate updates, job notifications, and support.
- To improve and personalize your experience.

3. Information Sharing
- With employers for job application processing.
- With service providers for app maintenance and analytics.
- If required by law or legal process.

4. Data Security
We implement industry-standard security measures but cannot guarantee absolute security.

5. Your Rights
You may access, update, or request deletion of your personal data via app settings or by contacting support.

6. Children’s Privacy
Our app is intended for users aged 18 or older. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 18.

7. Changes to This Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via the app.

8. Contact Us
For questions or concerns, please contact us through the Help & Support section in the app.
If you have any issues or questions, please press the button below to directly call our support team. Our support number: 0184-721-7092. We are always ready to assist you.
